titleStmt.title: An excellent song wherein you shall finde great consolation for a troubled minde. To the tune of Fortune my foe.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the assignes of Thomas Symcocke.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Ayme not too hie in things aboue thy reach ..."
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
